title: Celebrating Food and Family
description: Harvest season is a time when family traditions are celebrated with gratitude for food and each other. These traditions vary from place to place around the world. In this informational text, students will learn about the differences and the similarities of celebrations in four countries.
highFrequencyWords: ancestors, celebrations, Chuseok, etrog, persimmons, Sukkoth, synagogue, tortoises, yams
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Plurals                : Correctly use rules to make nouns plural
awareness: Compound Words                : Recognize, define and use compound words
phonics:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
